t: I*pn will give you thanks with all my heart; I*ln will sing your praise before the heavenly beings.
I*ln will bow down toward your holy temple and*ln give thanks to your name for*ln your constant love and truth. You*ln have exalted your name and*ln your promise above everything else.
On*ln the day I called, you answered me; you*ln increased strength within me.
All*pn the kings on earth will give you thanks, Lord,*s when*ln they hear what you have promised.
They*ln will sing of the Lord’s*s ways, for*ln the Lord’s*s glory is great.
Though*ln the Lord*s is exalted, he*ln takes note of the humble; but*ln he knows the haughty from a distance.
If*pn I walk into the thick of danger, you*ln will preserve my life from*ln the anger of my enemies. You*ln will extend your hand; your*ln right hand will save me.
The*ln Lord*s will fulfill his purpose for me. Lord,*sln your faithful love endures forever; do*ln not abandon the work of your hands.
